scripts.copy-contracts-build: echo " Copying build/contracts/* files into ./frontend/src/contracts " && copyfiles -f build/contracts/* ./frontend/src/contracts
scripts.deploy:local: truffle migrate --reset && truffle exec scripts/seed-habits.js && npm run copy-contracts-build && node index.js
scripts.deploy:testnet: truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset --compile-all && truffle exec scripts/seed-habits-testnet.js --network rinkeby && npm run copy-contracts-build
